text: Ghemme is a comune in the Province of Novara in the Piedmont region in Italy. It is on the river Sesia about northeast of Turin and about northwest of Novara. It is the birthplace of architect Alessandro Antonelli. The main sight is the castle (Castello-ricetto), which was built in the 11th to 15th centuries. Ghemme is known for its wine of the same name. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Settlements in Novara
title: Ghemme
